howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Two role-based workflows designed for speed, transparency and predictable outcomes.

employer.step1Description: Publish scope, deadlines, budget ranges and documents in one process.
employer.step2Description: Collect structured offers from subscribed professional contractors.
employer.step3Description: Compare submissions and award the best-fit partner.

contractor.step1Description: Activate Basic or Pro access and unlock project participation.
contractor.step2Description: Filter opportunities by canton, category, status and deadlines.
contractor.step3Description: Send clear commercial proposals with documentation.

why.title: Why ProBau.ch
why.description: Built for trust-first procurement in Swiss construction markets.
why.card1Description: Reach construction opportunities across all cantons from one platform.

why.card3Description: Upload project files in a structured procurement process.
why.card4Description: Basic and Pro plans provide straightforward access to project opportunities.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Protecting your personal data is a top priority at ProBau.ch.
privacy.processingText: We process account, contact and project data to provide platform services.
privacy.retentionText: Data is stored only as long as contractually, legally or operationally required.
privacy.rightsText: You may request access, correction or deletion at privacy@probau.ch.

agb.title: General Terms and Conditions
agb.intro: These terms govern the use of ProBau.ch by project owners and contractors.
agb.scopeText: ProBau.ch provides a digital marketplace for construction projects in Switzerland.
agb.subscriptionsText: Contractors require an active subscription to submit offers. Fees are billed monthly.
agb.liabilityText: ProBau.ch is a platform intermediary and not a contractual party between users.
